item.title: HTC introduces smartphone and imaging ecosystem components in Singapore
item.description:
HTC debuted its new camera, the RE, alongside the HTC Desire EYE smartphone, HTC Eye Experience imaging software, and Zoe, a collaborative video editing community, in Singapore. Jack Yang, President of South Asia, HTC Corporation, stated that similar to how HTC allowed people to replace laptops with smartphones in 1997, HTC is again revolutionizing technology by offering powerful hardware coupled with exceptional software. He emphasized HTC’s aim to change the way we perceive imaging â€” taking users beyond the viewfinder and placing them in the midst of the action with innovative software that enhances the use of technology...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/htc-introduces-smartphone-and-imaging-ecosystem-components-in-singapore/

item.title: HTC introduces new phone and software: Beauty is in the eye of the beholder
item.description:
Building on its legacy of smartphone innovation, HTC has introduced its latest top-tier HTC Desire model, the HTC Desire EYE, alongside new mobile imaging software and a collaborative video editing app. Source: HTC. The new Desire EYE smartphone in submarine blue. The waterproof* 4G Desire EYE, powered by the Qualcomm Snapdragon 801 processor, is engineered to be the ultimate multimedia device. Dual 13MP cameras (front and rear) deliver high-quality images and allow for one-handed photography...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/htc-introduces-new-phone-and-software-beauty-is-in-the-eye-of-the-beholder/

item.title: What Can GigE Bandwidth Do For You?
item.description:
Gigabit Ethernet is becoming increasingly common in local area networks, with network cards and backbones now supporting these higher speeds. Companies that rely heavily on digital processes and high bandwidth data transfers are likely already using Gigabit Ethernet. However, they need a way to extend these high-speed transfers beyond their local networks. Companies with large numbers of employees, extensive customer bases, or applications that generate significant amounts of data can benefit from Gigabit Ethernet WAN connections...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/what-can-gige-bandwidth-do-for-you/
